main: ^One of your passengers finds some weird meat in the cooler.
FirstChoice: ^Against all advice, the passenger eats the meat. Turns out it was just old tofu, but the taste was enough to make everyone gag. (PARTY happiness -1)
SecondChoice: ^You wisely throw out the mystery meat. Everyone breathes a sigh of relief, appreciating your sensible decision. (PARTY happiness +1)
ThirdChoice: ^Everyone denies knowing about the meat. It remains a mystery, but at least it brought some laughs. (PARTY happiness +0.5)
